00164 template<class T> T mfList<T>::pos(int pos)
00165 {
00166         MF_ASSERT((pos >=0)&&(pos < lsize));
00167         
00168         mfListNode<T> *p = lfirst;
00169         
00170         for(int i=0; i<pos; i++)
00171         {
00172                 MF_ASSERT(p);
00173                 p = p->getNext();
00174         }
00175         
00176         return p->getInfo();

00196 template<class T> void mfList<T>::insert(T novo)
00197 {
00198         mfListNode<T> *t = new mfListNode<T>();
00199 
00200         MF_ASSERT(t);
00201 
00202         t->setInfo(novo);
00203         if (lsize==0)
00204                 lfirst = t;
00205         else
00206         {
00207                 MF_ASSERT(llast);
00208                 llast->setNext(t);
00209         }
00210         llast = t;
00211         lsize++;
00212 };

00214 template<class T> bool mfList<T>::insertOnlyOne(T novo)
00215 {
00216         if (lsize==0)
00217         {
00218                 mfListNode<T> *t = new mfListNode<T>();
00219                 MF_ASSERT(t);
00220 
00221                 t->setInfo(novo);
00222                 t->setNext(NULL);
00223                 lfirst = t;
00224                 llast = t;
00225         }
00226         else
00227         {
00228                 mfListNode<T> *point = lfirst;
00229                 MF_ASSERT(point);
00230 
00231                 while((point->getNext()!=NULL)&&(point->getInfo() != novo))
00232                 {
00233                         point = point->getNext();
00234                         MF_ASSERT(point);
00235                 }
00236 
00237                 if(point->getInfo() != novo)
00238                 {
00239                         mfListNode<T> *t = new mfListNode<T>();
00240 
00241                         MF_ASSERT(t);
00242 
00243                         t->setInfo(novo);
00244                         t->setNext(NULL);
00245                         point->setNext(t);
00246                         llast = t;
00247                 }
00248                 else
00249                         return false;
00250         };
00251         lsize++;
00252 
00253         return true;
00254 };

00269 template<class T> void mfList<T>::insert(T novo, int pos)
00270 {
00271         MF_ASSERT((pos >=0)&&(pos <= lsize));
00272 
00273         mfListNode<T> *t = new mfListNode<T>();
00274 
00275         MF_ASSERT(t);
00276 
00277         t->setInfo(novo);
00278         if ((pos==0)||(lsize==0))
00279         {
00280                 t->setNext(lfirst);
00281                 lfirst = t;
00282                 if (lsize==0) llast = t;
00283         }
00284         else
00285         {
00286                 mfListNode<T> *point=lfirst;
00287                 MF_ASSERT(point);
00288                 int i;
00289                 for(i=1; (i<pos)&&(point->getNext()!=NULL); i++)
00290                 {
00291                         point = point->getNext();
00292                         MF_ASSERT(point);
00293                 }
00294                 t->setNext(point->getNext());
00295                 point->setNext(t);
00296                 if (pos>=lsize) llast = t;
00297         };
00298         lsize++;
00299 };

00301 template<class T> bool mfList<T>::erase(int pos)
00302 {
00303         MF_ASSERT((pos >=0)&&(pos < lsize));
00304 
00305         mfListNode<T> *p,*a;
00306 
00307         if (pos ==0)
00308         {
00309                 p = lfirst;
00310                 MF_ASSERT(lfirst);
00311                 lfirst = lfirst->getNext();
00312                 if (lsize==1) llast = NULL;
00313                 delete p;
00314         }
00315         else
00316         {
00317                 a = lfirst;
00318                 MF_ASSERT(lfirst);
00319                 p = lfirst->getNext();
00320                 for(int i=1; i<pos; i++)
00321                 {
00322                         a = p;
00323                         MF_ASSERT(p);
00324                         p = p->getNext();
00325                 };
00326 
00327                 a->setNext(p->getNext());
00328                 if(pos==(lsize-1)) llast = a;
00329                 delete p;
00330         };
00331         lsize--;
00332         return true;
00333 };

00335 template<class T> bool mfList<T>::inList(T info)
00336 {
00337         if (lsize==0) return false;
00338 
00339         mfListNode<T> *p=lfirst;
00340 
00341         MF_ASSERT(p);
00342 
00343         for(int i=0; (p->getInfo()!=info)&&(i<lsize);i++)
00344         {
00345                 if (p->getNext() != NULL) p=p->getNext();
00346                 MF_ASSERT(p);
00347         }
00348         return (p->getInfo()==info);
00349 };

00351 template<class T> int mfList<T>::search(T info)
00352 {
00353         int i;
00354 
00355         if (lsize==0) return -1;
00356 
00357         mfListNode<T> *p=lfirst;
00358 
00359         MF_ASSERT(p);
00360 
00361         for(i=0; (p->getInfo()!=info)&&(i<lsize);i++)
00362         {
00363                 if (p->getNext() != NULL) p=p->getNext();
00364                 MF_ASSERT(p);
00365         }
00366         if(p->getInfo()==info)
00367                 return i;
00368         else
00369                 return -1;
00370 };

00372 template<class T> void mfList<T>::clear()
00373 {
00374         while(lsize > 0)
00375                 erase(0);
00376 
00377         lsize = 0;
00378         lfirst=NULL;
00379         llast=NULL;
